Title: SilverSocket
Description: Hight performance socket server and client for Silverlight and Net 3.5.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Hight performance socket server and client for Silverlight and Net 3.5.

Provides easy integration into Silverlight projects.
Includes serialization, compression & encryption of data messages.
Designed for high performance and simplicity.

Great alternative to WCF duplex connection.
